mapper.select: SELECT t.task_id, t.parent_task_id, t.title, t.content, t.start_date, t.end_date, t.status FROM task t LEFT JOIN user_task ut on t.task_id = ut.task_id WHERE ut.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT t.task_id, t.parent_task_id, t.title, t.content, t.start_date, t.end_date, t.status FROM task t LEFT JOIN user_task ut on t.task_id = ut.task_id WHERE t.task_id = #{taskId} AND ut.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO task (parent_task_id, title, content, start_date, end_date, status, created_by) VALUES (#{parentTaskId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, 1, #{})
